text: Aey logo apney perwerdigar say daro jiss ney tumhen aik jaan say peda kiya aur ussi say uss ki biwi ko peda ker kay unn dono say boht say mard aur aurten phela den uss Allah say daro jiss kay naam per aik doosray say maangtay ho aur rishtay naatay toryney say bhi bacho be-shak Allah Taalaa tum per nigehbaan hai
